item.title: Auditing and a snake
item.description: It was a snake!” “What!? Here!? In the city!? A snake!?” “Yes, she saw it. Said it was a ‘vellikettan’ – a small snake with white stripes across.” “Vellikettan!! That is a very poisonous snake!” “She said so too. I don’t know much about snakes or their habitats but she said its because the forest is depleting that the snakes are coming to the cities in search of food.”
